channel.title: Homes on Welcome to Xin's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Welcome to Xin's Homepage

item.description: Biography I am a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at Qualcomm AI Research, USA. Before joining Qualcomm, I worked at Wins Lab, Lehigh University under the advisement of Professor Mooi Choo Chuah.

item.title: Awards
item.description: ü•à Silver Medal in the Peking University/Baidu - Autonomous Driving competition. 01/2020. üéñ Qualstar Award for the dedication and great work in driver monitoring system development, Qualcomm. 01/2020. ü•á No.1 in the ApolloScape Trajectory Prediction competition. 10/2019. üèÜ Student Travel Grant from US National Science Foundation (NSF) to the IEEE INFOCOM 2017. 02/2017. üèÜ Gotshall Fellowship, Lehigh University. 09/2015 - 05/2016. ü•á First Prize in the Shandong (China) Division of the “Challenge Cup” National College Student Curricular Academic Science and Technology Works Competition.

item.title: Teaching
